verses.roman:
bhaṭṭa kahe,--cala, prabhu, īśvara-daraśane
snāna kari' tāṅhā muñi āsichoṅ ekhane

synonyms: bhaṭṭa kahe—Bhaṭṭācārya said; cala—go; prabhu—my Lord; īśvara-daraśane—to see Lord Jagannātha, the Personality of Godhead; snāna kari'-taking my bath; tāṅhā—there; muñi—I; āsichoṅ—shall come back; ekhane—here.
translation: Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya said, " Please go, my Lord, to see Lord Jagannātha. After taking my bath, I shall go there and then return."
